caption="Betsy Butterbur" from ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]''

column1: '''Betsy Butterbur''' is a woman of [[Bree]], played by [[Katie Jackson]] ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]''.

Betsy was a relative of "Butterbur, Sr.", and worked as a barmaid at [[the Prancing Pony]]. She waited on both [[Thorin]] and [[Gandalf]] when the two met in the inn.<ref>''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]''</ref>
